attributes.action: Married to U.K. Citizen automatic right to live in U.K.
attributes.background: Some husband and wife's are being asked to leave although they've lived here for years you can't split family's up end of it is the right of any uk citizen to marry who they want.

rejection.details:
Please note that there is already a petition open that covers the issue you raise. You may wish to sign the existing petition as duplicate petitions are not allowed.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/174590
